name: Ant-Heritance (Over 6,500 Unique Bugs!)
description:
Battle your bug brethren and reclaim the powers that are rightfully yours!

Establish your insect dynasty by living out your days, having kids, then playing as one of them as they, too, battle to become the sole inheritor! 

Discover all 6,500 procedural bugs in your complicated and violent family tree.

Cassidy Coates - Programming 

Jackson D'Errico - Level Design and Modeling
                https://www.artstation.com/jackson-derrico

Audrey Engel - UI, VFX
                https://www.artstation.com/audreyengel

Andrew Grant - Player Models, Power Up Models
                https://www.artstation.com/assortednonsense
